page.title: 19LEISURE IN DARLINGTON
page.content: A lot of people go out of town to spend their leisure time.Darlington is in between the Yorkshire Moors and Dales and on a direct route to the Lake District, so obviously walking is one of the most popular leisure activities followed by swimming, gardening and squash.There are only two sports centres in Darlington, the Dolphin Centre and one in Larchfield Street.In the Dolphin Centre there are about twenty five different sporting facilities - weight training, soccer, roller-skating and snooker are just a few sports. There are a great many other different types of leisure activities that people do such as Scottish Dancing, lace making, card making and pottery making.
